column4: Can I upgrade my x32 Ubuntu to an x64 version without completely reinstalling?

I see... ok, thanks! Kind of interesting though, I'd say that the partitions are there anyway, there is no difference between 32- and 64-bit partitions, just the files (... most of them, I'm pretty sure) on them need to be replaced...
Right.  Partitions are a disk concept, not an OS one.
